themes.promptFragment:
Modern (modern product/engineering docs)
- Palette: Follow user's color theme if provided. If none is provided, use neutral base + 1 accent (optional 1 secondary). Keep palette small; ensure high text contrast; avoid rainbow.
- Shapes: Rounded rectangles with subtle radius; consistent stroke width; light fills; use containers for grouping.
- Layout: Grid-aligned; consistent padding/gaps; clear visual hierarchy; generous whitespace.
- Connectors: Orthogonal routing with explicit waypoints; consistent arrowheads; minimize crossings.
- Avoid: Gradients, heavy shadows, 3D effects, decorative clutter.

Academic (papers, technical docs, e-journals)
- Palette: Follow user's color theme if provided. If none is provided, use neutral + 1 muted accent (optional 1 secondary). Must remain legible in grayscale; never rely on color alone (use labels/line styles).
- Shapes: Mostly rectilinear; minimal rounding; white/light fills; consistent line weights; tidy group frames.
- Layout: Strict alignment; uniform spacing; stable label positions; readable at 100% and 50% scale.
- Connectors: Orthogonal with explicit waypoints; avoid crossings; dashed lines only with clear semantics and labels.
- Avoid: Decorative icons, thick outlines, heavy fills, strong shadows.

Minimal (wireframes, concept maps)
- Palette: Follow user's color theme if provided. If none is provided, use monochrome/dual-tone; use color sparingly and consistently.
- Shapes: Basic forms only; no icons; no/very light fill; thin borders.
- Layout: Few elements; lots of whitespace; short labels; avoid dense clusters.
- Connectors: Straight or simple orthogonal; thin lines; open arrows; minimal bends.
- Avoid: Shadows, gradients, heavy borders, complex shapes, visual noise.

Custom (user-defined)
- Follow user's style description exactly as provided in conversation.
- If no style specified, fall back to Modern theme.
- Respect all user palette/brand rules verbatim.
- Keep palette small and consistent; never invent arbitrary colors.

colorThemes.promptFragment:
Color Theme: Default (DrawIO Classic)
Use the standard DrawIO color palette with fillColor/strokeColor pairs:
- Blue (#dae8fc/#6c8ebf): Main process nodes, primary flow, scope management
- Green (#d5e8d4/#82b366): Success states, completed steps, progress tracking
- Yellow (#fff2cc/#d6b656): Decision points, warnings, risk management
- Red (#f8cecc/#b85450): Error states, critical items, quality issues
- Purple (#e1d5e7/#9673a6): Documents, external references, special elements
- Orange (#ffe6cc/#d79b00): Warnings, attention items, important notices
- Gray (#f5f5f5/#666666): Containers, swimlanes, general grouping
Apply fillColor for node backgrounds and strokeColor for borders. Use strokeColor for connector lines. Maintain consistent pairing throughout the diagram.

Color Theme: Blue Monochrome
Use blue color variations exclusively:
- Light blue (#d4e6f1/#85c1e9): Background elements, containers, less important nodes
- Medium blue (#aed6f1/#5dade2): Standard process nodes, main content
- Dark blue (#85c1e9/#3498db): Important nodes, key decisions, highlights
- Navy blue (#5dade2/#2874a6): Critical elements, headers, emphasis
- Stroke: Use darker shades from the palette for borders and connectors
Maintain visual hierarchy through lightness variation. Apply fillColor/strokeColor pairs consistently.

Color Theme: Green Monochrome
Use green color variations exclusively:
- Light green (#d5f4e6/#7dcea0): Background elements, containers, supporting nodes
- Medium green (#a9dfbf/#52be80): Standard process nodes, main content
- Dark green (#7dcea0/#27ae60): Important nodes, completed states, highlights
- Forest green (#52be80/#1e8449): Critical elements, success indicators, emphasis
- Stroke: Use darker shades from the palette for borders and connectors
Convey growth, progress, and positive outcomes through green variations. Apply fillColor/strokeColor pairs consistently.

Color Theme: Warm (Red-Orange-Yellow)
Use warm colors from the DrawIO palette:
- Red (#f8cecc/#b85450): Critical nodes, error states, urgent alerts, quality issues
- Orange (#ffe6cc/#d79b00): Warning nodes, attention areas, important notices
- Yellow (#fff2cc/#d6b656): Highlights, pending states, decision points, caution markers
- Stroke: Use corresponding strokeColor values (#b85450, #d79b00, #d6b656) for borders and connectors
- Background: Light warm tones for group containers
Ideal for alert systems, risk management, urgent workflows. Ensure sufficient contrast between adjacent warm colors. Apply fillColor/strokeColor pairs consistently.

Color Theme: Cool (Blue-Purple)
Use cool colors from the DrawIO palette:
- Blue (#dae8fc/#6c8ebf): Main nodes, primary processes, standard flow
- Purple (#e1d5e7/#9673a6): Alternative flows, documents, external references, special elements
- Stroke: Use corresponding strokeColor values (#6c8ebf, #9673a6) for borders and connectors
- Background: Light blue or purple tones for group containers
Ideal for business processes, documentation, formal diagrams. Convey calm, trust, and professionalism. Apply fillColor/strokeColor pairs consistently.

Color Theme: Grayscale (Black-White-Gray)
Use grayscale colors exclusively:
- White (#ffffff/#666666): Background, default containers
- Light gray (#f5f5f5/#666666): Standard nodes, swimlanes, group containers
- Medium gray (#cccccc/#666666): Secondary nodes, supporting elements
- Dark gray (#999999/#333333): Important nodes, headers, emphasis
- Charcoal (#666666/#000000): Critical elements, strong emphasis
- Stroke: Use #666666 or darker for all borders and connectors
Perfect for print, formal documentation, academic papers. Use varying shades to create hierarchy. Ensure sufficient contrast between adjacent elements. Apply fillColor/strokeColor pairs consistently.

Color Theme: Earth Tones (Natural Colors)
Use natural earth tones:
- Green (#d5e8d4/#82b366): Natural elements, eco-friendly processes, growth
- Beige (#f5f5dc/#c19a6b): Neutral background, containers, supporting elements
- Tan (#deb887/#8b7355): Standard nodes, organic processes
- Brown (#d2b48c/#8b4513): Earth elements, grounding components, foundations
- Stroke: Use darker earth tones (#82b366, #c19a6b, #8b7355, #8b4513) for borders and connectors
Ideal for environmental, agricultural, sustainability diagrams. Convey organic, natural, earth-friendly themes. Apply fillColor/strokeColor pairs consistently.

Color Theme: None (No Restriction)
- No specific color palette enforced
- Let the diagram style theme determine default colors
- If user provides custom colors in conversation, use those exactly
- Otherwise follow the selected diagram style (modern/academic/minimal) defaults
- Maintain consistency within the diagram
- Ensure sufficient contrast for readability

knowledge.promptFragment:
**HTML in value**: Add `html=1` to style when using HTML tags (e.g., `
`, ``, `
`) in the `value` attribute. | ID | Meaning | Example style | |---|---|---| | rectangle | Basic box, text label, group frame | rounded=1;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;strokeColor=#666666 | | ellipse | Circle or oval shape | ellipse;html=1;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#666666 | | rhombus | Decision diamond | rhombus;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00 | | triangle | Triangle shape | triangle;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf | | text | Plain text label | text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle | | line | Straight line | line;strokeColor=#666666;strokeWidth=2 | | image | Custom icon/image | shape=image;image=data:image/svg+xml,... | | swimlane | Container/lane | swimlane;html=1;fillColor=#f5f5f5;strokeColor=#666666 | | note | Sticky note | shape=note;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656 | | curlyBracket | Brace (use flipH=1 for right) | shape=curlyBracket;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#666666 |

| ID | Meaning | Example style |
|---|---|---|
| mxgraph.flowchart.terminator | Start/End | shape=mxgraph.flowchart.terminator;fillColor=#d5e8d4 |
| mxgraph.flowchart.process | Process step | shape=mxgraph.flowchart.process;fillColor=#dae8fc |
| mxgraph.flowchart.decision | Decision point | shape=mxgraph.flowchart.decision;fillColor=#ffe6cc |
| mxgraph.flowchart.data | Input/Output data | shape=mxgraph.flowchart.data;fillColor=#f8cecc |
| mxgraph.flowchart.document | Document | shape=mxgraph.flowchart.document;fillColor=#e1d5e7 |
| mxgraph.flowchart.stored_data | Database/Storage | shape=mxgraph.flowchart.stored_data;fillColor=#dae8fc |
| mxgraph.flowchart.manual_input | Manual input | shape=mxgraph.flowchart.manual_input;fillColor=#fff2cc |
| mxgraph.flowchart.delay | Delay | shape=mxgraph.flowchart.delay;fillColor=#f5f5f5 |

| ID | Meaning | Example style |

| note | Sticky note | shape=note;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656 |

| swimlane | Swimlane container | swimlane;fillColor=#f5f5f5;strokeColor=#666666 |
